About Bitcoin Wifi

Bitcoin Wifi is an open source wifi hotspot system hosted on a Raspberry Pi for which can be paid with bitcoin.

This amount is for the first hour, check out the prices for longer sessions. By sending a payment to this address, you agree with the terms and conditions of this hotspot.
